title: A GraphQL Query Parser
text: Bindings ‘libgraphqlparser’ C++ library. Parses GraphQL syntax exports AST JSON format.

what: Dump GraphQL Queries to JSON — graphql2json
title: Dump GraphQL Queries to JSON — graphql2json
text: Parses GraphQL queries exports AST JSON format.
